All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppConstants
Constants for the application.
Block
The Block class represents a block in the blockchain.
BlockchainApiApplication
The BlockchainApiApplication class is the main class for the blockchain-api application.
BlockchainController
The BlockchainController class is the controller for the blockchain endpoints.
BlockchainProduction
The BlockchainProduction class is a model for the production health metric.
BlockchainService
The BlockchainService class is responsible for managing the blockchain.
BlockController
The BlockController class is the controller for the block endpoints.
ContaminationLevel
The ContaminationLevel enum represents the level of contamination of an exception.
HealthMetricController
The health metric controller.
HealthMetricProductionModel
The HealthMetricProductionModel class is a model for the production health metric.
HealthMetricService
The HealthMetricService class.
MainController
Main controller for the API.
Node
The node of the network.
NodeController
The node for the node network.
NodeHealth
NodeHealth is the health of a node.
NodeHealthResponse
NodeHealthResponse is the response for the node network health.
NodeManagerController
NodeManagerController is the controller for the NodeManagerService.
NodeManagerService
NodeManagerService is responsible for managing the network of nodes.
NodeRegistryRequest
NodeRegistryRequest is a request object for registering a node.
NodeService
Service class for node operations.
NodeStatus
The NodeStatus enum represents the status of a node.
NodeStatusResponse
NodeRegistryRequest is a request object for registering a node.
SlidingWindow
The SlidingWindow class is a data structure that holds a maximum number of elements.
Transaction
The Transaction class represents a transaction in the blockchain.
TransactionController
The TransactionController class is responsible for managing transactions.
TransactionService
The TransactionService class is responsible for managing transactions.
TransactionStatus
The Status enum represents the status of an order.

The Utils class is a utility class that provides methods for calculating
